text: The 1978–79 NHL season was the 62nd season of the National Hockey League. The 17 teams of the league played an 80-game season. The Montreal Canadiens beat the New York Rangers in the Stanley Cup finals four games to one for their fourth Cup in a row. ==Regular season== ===Final standings=== GP = Games Played, W = Wins, L =
